term.title: Einstein equation

item.text: In its most general form, the Einstein equation relates the atomic mobilitybi of a species i to the diffusion coefficientDi: i.e., Di = k.T.bi.

sources.item: PAC, 1999, 71, 1307. 'Definitions of Terms for Diffusion in the Solid State' on page 1314 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199971071307)
